description.fr:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Inflige {value:percentAtt,percent} de son {%AT} aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui s'il est {PropertyEffect:99[mutilé]}.
description.en:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Inflicts {value:percentAtt,percent} of their {%AT} on surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> opponents if {PropertyEffect:99[mutilated]}.
description.es:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Inflige un {value:percentAtt,percent} de su {%AT} a los adversarios a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> si está {PropertyEffect:99[mutilado]}.
description.de:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Fügt Gegnern in seinem Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> {value:percentAtt,percent} seines {%AT,plural:two} als Schaden zu, falls er {PropertyEffect:99[verstümmelt]} ist.
description.pt:
<rem>{PropertyEffect:28}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Inflige {value:percentAtt,percent} de seu {%AT} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele se ele estiver {PropertyEffect:99[mutilado]}.

gameplayDescription.fr:
{PropertyEffect:28}\_: Plus vous avez mal, plus vous faites de dégâts\_!
\---
{PropertyEffect:99}\_: Flagellez-vous pour obtenir des effets supplémentaires\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
{PropertyEffect:28}: The more you hurt, the more damage you do!
\---
{PropertyEffect:99}: Give yourself a lashing to get extra effects!
gameplayDescription.es:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Cuanto peor estás, más daño haces.
\---
{PropertyEffect:99}: ¡Flagélate para conseguir efectos adicionales!
gameplayDescription.de:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Je mehr Schmerzen du hast, desto mehr Schaden verursachst du!
\---
{PropertyEffect:99}: Verletz dich selbst, um zusätzliche Effekte zu erhalten!
gameplayDescription.pt:
{PropertyEffect:28}: Quanto mais você se machuca, mais danos você inflige!
\---
{PropertyEffect:99}: Flagele-se para obter efeitos adicionais!
